charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_020: Did you come here to do some training as well?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_040:
I can tell you’re passionate about training.
Perhaps a veteran like me could give you a
piece of advice?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_050:
When you give your Pokémon a command, pour as
much emotion into it as you can. Pokémon respond
to feelings much more than words alone.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_070: I see. Just out for a nice, relaxing stroll, then?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_080:
We could all use a little rest here and there.
It’s hard to pour your emotions into your battle
commands when you’re feeling exhausted.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_090: Well, I think it’s about time I returned to my hotel.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_100:
I hate to run off when we’ve only just begun
to chat...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_110:
but I have a pile of documents on my desk that is
calling my name.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_130:
Yes. As you know, I’m a Pokémon Trainer, but I’m
also an archeologist. It’s a very busy job.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_150:
Mostly academic. As you know, I’m a Pokémon
Trainer, but I’m also an archeologist.
It’s a very busy job.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_160:
Sometimes it feels like my stack of research
papers is never-ending... It just keeps growing
and growing.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_170:
And the moment I start organizing and cleaning
it up, I get distracted by something else.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_200:
I mean, I can’t throw them away if I might need
them someday, right?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_210:
And I use them all the time, so they need to be
placed somewhere I can reach them easily, right?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_240:
Cleaning is something you should put all your
effort into, and make sure you get it all done
at once.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_250:
Otherwise, you’ll end up doing the same thing,
day after day.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_260:
Naturally, I’m the one who has to clean my own
home, eventually...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_270:
That’s why staying in a hotel is so nice.
The lovely staff there go in and clean my
room while I’m gone.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_280:
They tidy up all of my paperwork for me before
my stacks get out of hand.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_290:
Thanks to them, it’s easier than ever to find the
documents I’m looking for! They’ve helped me out
so much.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_300:
Likewise, when I was staying at my friend
Caitlin’s villa...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_310:
it didn’t take long for my room there to become a
mess of scattered research papers.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_320:
But Caitlin’s butler was kind enough to tidy it up
for me each day.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0301_330:
You aren’t very good at picking up
after yourself, huh?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_370:
When it comes to Pokémon battling, I know exactly
what I have to do.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_380:
But cleaning? I barely even know where to start,
let alone what works best.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_400:
You saw my Garchomp use Earthquake a moment
ago, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_410:
How did that move make you feel while you were
watching? I’m curious.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_430:
Well, I’ll find out what sort of Trainer you are
when we get the chance to battle...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0302_440: I thought I could do better than that!
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_450:
Well, I’ll find out what sort of Trainer you are
when we get the chance to battle...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_460: I’m looking forward to competing in the PML.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_470:
It’ll be interesting to find out what battling
means to each of the different competitors.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_480:
You included, of course! The two of us have to
face off at some point—I insist.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_490:
I want you to let out all of your emotions.
Show me who you truly are!
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_500:
I won’t let the battle end until I’ve had the chance
to witness your true emotions!
